AlgorithmCodeSimpleType.name: AlgorithmCodeSimpleType
AlgorithmCodeSimpleType.documentation: A data type for Algorithm properties

ChecksumAlgorithmMd5.documentation: Indicates the algorithm used was MD5

ChecksumAlgorithmSha1.documentation: Indicates the algorithm used was SHA-1

ChecksumAlgorithmSha256.documentation: Indicates the algorithm used was SHA256

AnnotationTypeCodeSimpleType.name: AnnotationTypeCodeSimpleType
AnnotationTypeCodeSimpleType.documentation: A data type for AnnotationType properties

AnnotationTypeOther.documentation: Type of annotation which does not fit in any of the pre-defined annotation types.

AnnotationTypeReview.documentation: A Review represents an audit and signoff by an individual, organization or tool on the information for an SpdxElement.

CopyrightTextCodeSimpleType.name: CopyrightTextCodeSimpleType
CopyrightTextCodeSimpleType.documentation: A data type for CopyrightText properties

Noassertion.documentation: Indicates that the preparer of the SPDX document is not making any assertion regarding the value of this field.

None.documentation: When this value is used as the object of a property it indicates that the preparer of the SpdxDocument believes that there is no value for the property. This value should only be used if there is sufficient evidence to support this assertion.

DownloadLocationCodeSimpleType.name: DownloadLocationCodeSimpleType
DownloadLocationCodeSimpleType.documentation: A data type for DownloadLocation properties

Noassertion.documentation: Indicates that the preparer of the SPDX document is not making any assertion regarding the value of this field.

None.documentation: When this value is used as the object of a property it indicates that the preparer of the SpdxDocument believes that there is no value for the property. This value should only be used if there is sufficient evidence to support this assertion.

FileTypeCodeSimpleType.name: FileTypeCodeSimpleType
FileTypeCodeSimpleType.documentation: A data type for FileType properties

FileTypeApplication.documentation: The file is associated with a specific application type (MIME type of application/* )

FileTypeArchive.documentation: Indicates the file is an archive file.

FileTypeAudio.documentation: The file is associated with an audio file (MIME type of audio/* , ie. .mp3 ); IMAGE if the file is assoicated with an picture image file (MIME type of image/*, ie. .jpg, .gif )

FileTypeBinary.documentation: Indicates the file is not a text file. spdx:filetype_archive is preferred for archive files even though they are binary.

FileTypeImage.documentation: The file is assoicated with an picture image file (MIME type of image/*, ie. .jpg, .gif ).

FileTypeOther.documentation: Indicates the file is not a source, archive or binary file.

FileTypeSource.documentation: Indicates the file is a source code file.

FileTypeSpdx.documentation: The file is an SPDX document.

FileTypeText.documentation: The file is human readable text file (MIME type of text/*).

FileTypeVideo.documentation: The file is associated with a video file type (MIME type of video/*).

LicenseConcludedCodeSimpleType.name: LicenseConcludedCodeSimpleType
LicenseConcludedCodeSimpleType.documentation: A data type for LicenseConcluded properties

Noassertion.documentation: Indicates that the preparer of the SPDX document is not making any assertion regarding the value of this field.

None.documentation: When this value is used as the object of a property it indicates that the preparer of the SpdxDocument believes that there is no value for the property. This value should only be used if there is sufficient evidence to support this assertion.

LicenseDeclaredCodeSimpleType.name: LicenseDeclaredCodeSimpleType
LicenseDeclaredCodeSimpleType.documentation: A data type for LicenseDeclared properties

Noassertion.documentation: Indicates that the preparer of the SPDX document is not making any assertion regarding the value of this field.

None.documentation: When this value is used as the object of a property it indicates that the preparer of the SpdxDocument believes that there is no value for the property. This value should only be used if there is sufficient evidence to support this assertion.

LicenseInfoFromFilesCodeSimpleType.name: LicenseInfoFromFilesCodeSimpleType
LicenseInfoFromFilesCodeSimpleType.documentation: A data type for LicenseInfoFromFiles properties

Noassertion.documentation: Indicates that the preparer of the SPDX document is not making any assertion regarding the value of this field.

None.documentation: When this value is used as the object of a property it indicates that the preparer of the SpdxDocument believes that there is no value for the property. This value should only be used if there is sufficient evidence to support this assertion.

ReferenceCategoryCodeSimpleType.name: ReferenceCategoryCodeSimpleType
ReferenceCategoryCodeSimpleType.documentation: A data type for ReferenceCategory properties

RelationshipTypeCodeSimpleType.name: RelationshipTypeCodeSimpleType
RelationshipTypeCodeSimpleType.documentation: A data type for RelationshipType properties

RelationshipTypeAmendment.documentation: To be used when SPDXRef-A amends the SPDX information in SPDXRef-B.

RelationshipTypeAncestorOf.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_ancestorOf expresses that an SPDXElement is an ancestor of (same lineage but pre-dates) the relatedSPDXElement. For example, an upstream File is an ancestor of a modified downstream File

RelationshipTypeBuildToolOf.documentation: To be used when SPDXRef-A is used to to build SPDXRef-B.

RelationshipTypeContainedBy.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_containedBy expresses that an SPDXElement is contained by the relatedSPDXElement. For example, a File contained by a Package.

RelationshipTypeContains.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_contains expresses that an SPDXElement contains the relatedSPDXElement. For example, a Package contains a File. (relationshipType_contains introduced in SPDX 2.0 deprecates property 'hasFile' from SPDX 1.2)

RelationshipTypeCopyOf.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_copyOf expresses that the SPDXElement is an exact copy of the relatedSDPXElement. For example, a downstream distribution of a binary library which was copied from the upstream package.

RelationshipTypeDataFileOf.documentation: Is to be used when SPDXRef-A is a data file used in SPDXRef-B.

RelationshipTypeDescendantOf.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_descendantOf expresses that an SPDXElement is a descendant of (same lineage but post-dates) the relatedSPDXElement. For example, an downstream File that was modified is a descendant of an upstream File

RelationshipTypeDescribedBy.documentation: Is to be used an SPDXRef-A is described by SPDXRef-Document.

RelationshipTypeDescribes.documentation: Is to be used when SPDXRef-DOCUMENT describes SPDXRef-A.

RelationshipTypeDistributionArtifact.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_distributionArtifact expresses that distributing the SPDXElement requires that the relatedSPDXElement also be distributed. For example, distributing a binary File may require that a source tarball (another File) be made available with the distribuiton.

RelationshipTypeDocumentation.documentation: To be used when SPDXRef-A provides documentation of SPDXRef-B.

RelationshipTypeDynamicLink.documentation: Is to be used when SPDXRef-A dynamically links to SPDXRef-B.

RelationshipTypeExpandedFromArchive.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_expandedFromArchive expresses that the SPDXElement is a file which was epanded from a relatedSPDXElement file. For example, if there is an archive file xyz.tar.gz containing a file foo.c the archive file was expanded in a directory arch/xyz, the file arch/xyz/foo.c would have a relationshipType_expandedFromArchive with the file xyz.tar.gz.

RelationshipTypeFileAdded.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_fileAdded expresses that the SPDXElement is a file which has been added to the relatedSPDXElement package. For example, a package (the relatedSPDXElement) has been patched to remove a file (the SPDXElement). This relationship is typically used to express the result of a patched package when the actual patchfile is not present.

RelationshipTypeFileDeleted.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_fileDeleted expresses that the SPDXElement is a package where the relatedSPDXElement file has been removed. For example, a package has been patched to remove a file a file (the relatedSPDXElement resulting in the patched package (the SPDXElement). This relationship is typically used to express the result of a patched package when the actual patchfile is not present.

RelationshipTypeFileModified.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_fileModified expresses that the SPDXElement is a file which is a modified version of the relatedSPDXElement file. For example, a file (the SPDXElement) has been patched to modify the contents of the original file (the SPDXElement). This relationship is typically used to express the result of a patched package when the actual patchfile is not present.

RelationshipTypeGeneratedFrom.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_generatedFrom expresses that an SPDXElement was generated from the relatedSPDXElement. For example, a binary File might have been generated from a source File.

RelationshipTypeGenerates.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_generates expresses that an SPDXElement generates the relatedSPDXElement. For example, a source File generates a binary File.

RelationshipTypeHasPrerequisite.documentation: Is to be used when SPDXRef-A has as a prerequisite SPDXRef-B.

RelationshipTypeMetafileOf.documentation: To be used when SPDXRef-A is a metafile of SPDXRef-B.

RelationshipTypeOptionalComponentOf.documentation: To be used when SPDXRef-A is an optional component of SPDXRef-B.

RelationshipTypeOther.documentation: to be used for a relationship which has not been defined in the formal SPDX specification. A description of the relationship should be included in the Relationship comments field.

RelationshipTypePackageOf.documentation: To be used when SPDXRef-A is used as a package as part of SPDXRef-B.

RelationshipTypePatchApplied.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_patchApplied expresses that the SPDXElement is a 'patchfile' that was applied and produced the relatedSPDXElement. For example, a .diff File relates to a specific file where the diff was applied.

RelationshipTypePatchFor.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_patchFor expresses that the SPDXElement is a 'patchfile' that is designed to patch (apply modifications to) the relatedSPDXElement. For example, relationship from a .diff File to a Package it is designed to patch.

RelationshipTypePrerequisiteFor.documentation: Is to be used when SPDXRef-A is a prerequisite for SPDXRef-B

RelationshipTypeStaticLink.documentation: Is to be used when SPDXRef-A statically links to SPDXRef-B.

RelationshipTypeTestcaseOf.documentation: Is to be used when SPDXRef-A is a test case used in testing SPDXRef-B.

RelationshipTypeVariantOf.documentation: A Relationship of relationshipType_variantOf expresses that an SPDXElement is a variant of the relatedSPDXElement, but it is not clear which came first. For example, if the content of two Files differs by some edit, but there is no way to tell which came first (no reliable date information), then one File is a variant of the other File.

AlgorithmCodeType.name: AlgorithmCodeType
AlgorithmCodeType.documentation: A data type for Algorithm properties

AnnotationDateType.name: AnnotationDateType
AnnotationDateType.documentation: A data type for Identify when the comment was made. This is to be specified according to the combined date and time in the UTC format, as specified in the ISO 8601 standard.

AnnotationType.name: AnnotationType
AnnotationType.documentation: A data type for Annotation type

AnnotationTypeCodeType.name: AnnotationTypeCodeType
AnnotationTypeCodeType.documentation: A data type for AnnotationType properties

AnnotatorTextType.name: AnnotatorTextType
AnnotatorTextType.documentation: A data type for This field identifies the person, organization or tool that has commented on a file, package, or entire document.

AnyLicenseInfoType.documentation: A data type for AnyLicenseInfo type

ByteOffsetPointerType.documentation: A data type for ByteOffsetPointer type

ChecksumType.documentation: A data type for Checksum type

ChecksumValueType.name: ChecksumValueType
ChecksumValueType.documentation: A data type for The checksumValue property provides a lower case hexidecimal encoded digest value produced using a specific algorithm.

CompoundPointerType.name: CompoundPointerType
CompoundPointerType.documentation: A data type for CompoundPointer type

ConjunctiveLicenseSetType.name: ConjunctiveLicenseSetType
ConjunctiveLicenseSetType.documentation: A data type for ConjunctiveLicenseSet type

ContainerType.name: ContainerType
ContainerType.documentation: A data type for Container type

ContextualExampleTextType.name: ContextualExampleTextType
ContextualExampleTextType.documentation: A data type for Example for use of the external repository identifier

CopyrightTextCodeType.name: CopyrightTextCodeType
CopyrightTextCodeType.documentation: A data type for CopyrightText properties

CopyrightTextType.name: CopyrightTextType
CopyrightTextType.documentation: A data type for The text of copyright declarations recited in the Package or File.

CreatedDateTimeType.name: CreatedDateTimeType
CreatedDateTimeType.documentation: A data type for The date and time at which the SpdxDocument was created. This value must in UTC and have 'Z' as its timezone indicator.

CreationInfoType.name: CreationInfoType
CreationInfoType.documentation: A data type for CreationInfo type

CreatorTextType.name: CreatorTextType
CreatorTextType.documentation: A data type for The name and, optionally, contact information of a person, organization or tool that created, or was used to create, the SpdxDocument. Values of this property must conform to the agent and tool syntax.

DateType.name: DateType
DateType.documentation: A data type for A date-time stamp.

DescriptionTextType.name: DescriptionTextType
DescriptionTextType.documentation: A data type for Provides a detailed description of the package.

DisjunctiveLicenseSetType.name: DisjunctiveLicenseSetType
DisjunctiveLicenseSetType.documentation: A data type for DisjunctiveLicenseSet type

DocumentationURIType.name: DocumentationURIType
DocumentationURIType.documentation: A data type for Website containing the documentation related to the repository identifier

DownloadLocationCodeType.name: DownloadLocationCodeType
DownloadLocationCodeType.documentation: A data type for DownloadLocation properties

DownloadLocationURIType.name: DownloadLocationURIType
DownloadLocationURIType.documentation: A data type for The URI at which this package is available for download. Private (i.e., not publicly reachable) URIs are acceptable as values of this property. The values http://spdx.org/rdf/terms#none and http://spdx.org/rdf/terms#noassertion may be used to specify that the package is not downloadable or that no attempt was made to determine its download location, respectively.

ExampleTextType.name: ExampleTextType
ExampleTextType.documentation: A data type for Text for examples in describing an SPDX element.

ExternalDocumentIDType.name: ExternalDocumentIDType
ExternalDocumentIDType.documentation: A data type for externalDocumentId is a string containing letters, numbers, “.”, “-” or “+” which uniquely identifies an external document within this document.

ExternalDocumentRefType.name: ExternalDocumentRefType
ExternalDocumentRefType.documentation: A data type for ExternalDocumentRef type

ExternalRefType.name: ExternalRefType
ExternalRefType.documentation: A data type for ExternalRef type

ExternalReferenceSiteURIType.name: ExternalReferenceSiteURIType
ExternalReferenceSiteURIType.documentation: A data type for Website for the maintainers of the external reference site

ExtractedLicenseInfoType.name: ExtractedLicenseInfoType
ExtractedLicenseInfoType.documentation: A data type for ExtractedLicenseInfo type

ExtractedTextType.name: ExtractedTextType
ExtractedTextType.documentation: A data type for Verbatim license or licensing notice text that was discovered.

FileContributorTextType.name: FileContributorTextType
FileContributorTextType.documentation: A data type for This field provides a place for the SPDX file creator to record file contributors. Contributors could include names of copyright holders and/or authors who may not be copyright holders yet contributed to the file content.

FileNameType.name: FileNameType
FileNameType.documentation: A data type for The name of the file relative to the root of the package.

FileType.name: FileType
FileType.documentation: A data type for File type

FileTypeCodeType.name: FileTypeCodeType
FileTypeCodeType.documentation: A data type for FileType properties

FilesAnalyzedIndicatorType.name: FilesAnalyzedIndicatorType
FilesAnalyzedIndicatorType.documentation: A data type for Indicates whether the file content of this package has been available for or subjected to analysis when creating the SPDX document. If “false” indicates packages that represent metadata or URI references to a project, product, artifact, distribution or a component. If set to “false”, the package must not contain any files.

IsDeprecatedLicenseIDType.name: IsDeprecatedLicenseIDType
IsDeprecatedLicenseIDType.documentation: A data type that indicates if the license id is Deprecated.

IsFsfLibreType.name: IsFsfLibreType
IsFsfLibreType.documentation: A data type to indicate if the license is is FSF Libre.

IsOsiApprovedIndicatorType.name: IsOsiApprovedIndicatorType
IsOsiApprovedIndicatorType.documentation: A data type for Indicates if the OSI has approved the license.

LicenseCommentsTextType.name: LicenseCommentsTextType
LicenseCommentsTextType.documentation: A data type for he licenseComments property allows the preparer of the SPDX document to describe why the licensing in spdx:licenseConcluded was chosen.

LicenseConcludedCodeType.name: LicenseConcludedCodeType
LicenseConcludedCodeType.documentation: A data type for LicenseConcluded properties

LicenseDeclaredCodeType.name: LicenseDeclaredCodeType
LicenseDeclaredCodeType.documentation: A data type for LicenseDeclared properties

LicenseExceptionIDType.name: LicenseExceptionIDType
LicenseExceptionIDType.documentation: A data type for short form license exception identifier in Appendix I.2 of the SPDX specification.

LicenseExceptionTextType.name: LicenseExceptionTextType
LicenseExceptionTextType.documentation: A data type for Full text of the license exception.

LicenseExceptionType.name: LicenseExceptionType
LicenseExceptionType.documentation: A data type for LicenseException type

LicenseIDType.name: LicenseIDType
LicenseIDType.documentation: A data type for A human readable short form license identifier for a license. The license ID is iether on the standard license oist or the form "LicenseRef-"[idString] where [idString] is a unique string containing letters, numbers, ".", "-" or "+".

LicenseInfoFromFilesCodeType.name: LicenseInfoFromFilesCodeType
LicenseInfoFromFilesCodeType.documentation: A data type for LicenseInfoFromFiles properties

LicenseListVersionTextType.name: LicenseListVersionTextType
LicenseListVersionTextType.documentation: A data type for An optional field for creators of the SPDX file to provide the version of the SPDX License List used when the SPDX file was created.

LicenseTextType.name: LicenseTextType
LicenseTextType.documentation: A data type for Full text of the license.

LicenseType.name: LicenseType
LicenseType.documentation: A data type for License type

LineCharPointerType.name: LineCharPointerType
LineCharPointerType.documentation: A data type for LineCharPointer type

LineNumberNumericType.name: LineNumberNumericType
LineNumberNumericType.documentation: A data type for Line number within the reference starting at one.

ListedLicenseType.name: ListedLicenseType
ListedLicenseType.documentation: A data type for ListedLicense type

LocatorFormatTextType.name: LocatorFormatTextType
LocatorFormatTextType.documentation: A data type for Regular expression for the format of the external repository identifier

NameType.name: NameType
NameType.documentation: A data type for The full human readable name of the item. This should include version information when applicable.

NoticeTextType.name: NoticeTextType
NoticeTextType.documentation: A data type for This field provides a place for the SPDX file creator to record potential legal notices found in the file. This may or may not include copyright statements.

OffsetNumericType.name: OffsetNumericType
OffsetNumericType.documentation: A data type for Offset from the start of the reference.

OffsetPointerType.name: OffsetPointerType
OffsetPointerType.documentation: A data type for OffsetPointer type

OrLaterOperatorType.name: OrLaterOperatorType
OrLaterOperatorType.documentation: A data type for OrLaterOperator type

OriginatorTextType.name: OriginatorTextType
OriginatorTextType.documentation: A data type for The name and, optionally, contact information of the person or organization that originally created the package. Values of this property must conform to the agent and tool syntax.

PackageFileNameType.name: PackageFileNameType
PackageFileNameType.documentation: A data type for The base name of the package file name. For example, zlib-1.2.5.tar.gz.

PackageNameType.name: PackageNameType
PackageNameType.documentation: A data type for Identify the full name of the package as given by Package Originator.

PackageType.name: PackageType
PackageType.documentation: A data type for Package type

PackageVerificationCodeType.name: PackageVerificationCodeType
PackageVerificationCodeType.documentation: A data type for PackageVerificationCode type

PackageVerificationCodeValueType.name: PackageVerificationCodeValueType
PackageVerificationCodeValueType.documentation: A data type for The actual package verification code as a hex encoded value.

PointerType.name: PointerType
PointerType.documentation: A data type for Pointer type

ProjectType.name: ProjectType
ProjectType.documentation: A data type for Project type

ReferenceCategoryCodeType.name: ReferenceCategoryCodeType
ReferenceCategoryCodeType.documentation: A data type for ReferenceCategory properties

ReferenceIDType.name: ReferenceIDType
ReferenceIDType.documentation: A data type for ReferenceID type

ReferenceLocatorTextType.name: ReferenceLocatorTextType
ReferenceLocatorTextType.documentation: A data type for The unique string with no spaces necessary to access the package-specific information, metadata, or content within the target location. The format of the locator is subject to constraints defined by the <type>.

ReferenceType.name: ReferenceType
ReferenceType.documentation: A data type for Scope within which a single pointer operates.

RelationshipType.name: RelationshipType
RelationshipType.documentation: A data type for Relationship type

RelationshipTypeCodeType.name: RelationshipTypeCodeType
RelationshipTypeCodeType.documentation: A data type for RelationshipType properties

SeeAlsoURIType.name: SeeAlsoURIType
SeeAlsoURIType.documentation: A data type for rdfs:seeAlso is an instance of rdf:Property that is used to indicate a resource that might provide additional information about the subject resource.

SimpleLicensingInfoType.name: SimpleLicensingInfoType
SimpleLicensingInfoType.documentation: A data type for SimpleLicensingInfo type

SinglePointerType.name: SinglePointerType
SinglePointerType.documentation: A data type for SinglePointer type

SnippetNameType.name: SnippetNameType
SnippetNameType.documentation: A data type to name specific snippet in a human convenient manner

SnippetType.name: SnippetType
SnippetType.documentation: A data type for Snippet type

SourceInfoTextType.name: SourceInfoTextType
SourceInfoTextType.documentation: A data type for Allows the producer(s) of the SPDX document to describe how the package was acquired and/or changed from the original source.

SpdxDocumentType.name: SpdxDocumentType
SpdxDocumentType.documentation: A data type for SpdxDocument type

SpdxElementType.name: SpdxElementType
SpdxElementType.documentation: A data type for SpdxElement type

SpdxItemType.name: SpdxItemType
SpdxItemType.documentation: A data type for SpdxItem type

SpecVersionTextType.name: SpecVersionTextType
SpecVersionTextType.documentation: A data type for Identifies the version of this specification that was used to produce this SPDX document. The value for this version of the spec is SPDX-1.2. The values SPDX-1.0 and SPDX-1.1 may also be supported by SPDX tools for backwards compatibility purposes.

StandardLicenseHeaderTextType.name: StandardLicenseHeaderTextType
StandardLicenseHeaderTextType.documentation: A data type for License author's preferred text to indicated that a file is covered by the license.

StandardLicenseHeaderType.name: StandardLicenseHeaderType
StandardLicenseHeaderType.documentation: A data type for License author's preferred text to indicated that a file is covered by the license.

StandardLicenseTemplateTextType.name: StandardLicenseTemplateTextType
StandardLicenseTemplateTextType.documentation: A data type for License template which describes sections of the license which can be varied. See License Template section of the specification for format information.

StandardLicenseTemplateType.name: StandardLicenseTemplateType
StandardLicenseTemplateType.documentation:
A data type for License template which describes sections of the license which can be varied. See License Template section of the specification for format
 information.

StartEndPointerType.name: StartEndPointerType
StartEndPointerType.documentation: A data type for StartEndPointer type

SummaryTextType.name: SummaryTextType
SummaryTextType.documentation: A data type for Provides a short description of the package.

SupplierTextType.name: SupplierTextType
SupplierTextType.documentation: A data type for The name and, optionally, contact information of the person or organization who was the immediate supplier of this package to the recipient. The supplier may be different than originator when the software has been repackaged. Values of this property must conform to the agent and tool syntax.

VerificationCodeExcludedFileTextType.name: VerificationCodeExcludedFileTextType
VerificationCodeExcludedFileTextType.documentation: A data type for A file that was excluded when calculating the package verification code. This is usually a file containing SPDX data regarding the package. If a package contains more than one SPDX file all SPDX files must be excluded from the package verification code. If this is not done it would be impossible to correctly calculate the verification codes in both files.

VersionInfoTextType.name: VersionInfoTextType
VersionInfoTextType.documentation: A data type for Provides an indication of the version of the package that is described by this SpdxDocument.

WithExceptionOperatorType.name: WithExceptionOperatorType
WithExceptionOperatorType.documentation: A data type for WithExceptionOperator type

AlgorithmCode.name: AlgorithmCode
AlgorithmCode.documentation: A data item for Algorithm properties

AnnotationDate.name: AnnotationDate
AnnotationDate.documentation: A data type for Identify when the comment was made. This is to be specified according to the combined date and time in the UTC format, as specified in the ISO 8601 standard.

AnnotationTypeCode.name: AnnotationTypeCode
AnnotationTypeCode.documentation: A data item for AnnotationType properties

AnnotatorText.name: AnnotatorText
AnnotatorText.documentation: A data type for This field identifies the person, organization or tool that has commented on a file, package, or entire document.

ChecksumValue.name: ChecksumValue
ChecksumValue.documentation: A data type for The checksumValue property provides a lower case hexidecimal encoded digest value produced using a specific algorithm.

ContextualExampleText.name: ContextualExampleText
ContextualExampleText.documentation: A data type for Example for use of the external repository identifier

CopyrightText.name: CopyrightText
CopyrightText.documentation: A data type for The text of copyright declarations recited in the Package or File.

CopyrightTextCode.name: CopyrightTextCode
CopyrightTextCode.documentation: A data item for CopyrightText properties

CreatedDateTime.name: CreatedDateTime
CreatedDateTime.documentation: A data type for The date and time at which the SpdxDocument was created. This value must in UTC and have 'Z' as its timezone indicator.

CreatorText.name: CreatorText
CreatorText.documentation: A data type for The name and, optionally, contact information of a person, organization or tool that created, or was used to create, the SpdxDocument. Values of this property must conform to the agent and tool syntax.

DataLicenseText.name: DataLicenseText
DataLicenseText.documentation: A data item for The licensing under which the creator of this SPDX document allows related data to be reproduced. The only valid value for this property is http://spdx.org/licenses/CC0-1.0. This is to alleviate any concern that content (the data) in an SPDX file is subject to any form of intellectual property right that could restrict the re-use of the information or the creation of another SPDX file for the same project(s). This approach avoids intellectual property and related restrictions over the SPDX file, however individuals can still contract one to one to restrict release of specific collections of SPDX files (which map to software bill of materials) and the identification of the supplier of SPDX files.

Date.name: Date
Date.documentation: A data type for A date-time stamp.

DescribesFile.name: DescribesFile
DescribesFile.documentation: A data item for The describesFile property relates an SpdxDocument to the file which it describes.

DescribesPackage.name: DescribesPackage
DescribesPackage.documentation: A data item for The describesPackage property relates an SpdxDocument to the package which it describes.

DescriptionText.name: DescriptionText
DescriptionText.documentation: A data type for Provides a detailed description of the package.

DocumentationURI.name: DocumentationURI
DocumentationURI.documentation: A data type for Website containing the documentation related to the repository identifier

DownloadLocationCode.name: DownloadLocationCode
DownloadLocationCode.documentation: A data item for DownloadLocation properties

DownloadLocationURI.name: DownloadLocationURI
DownloadLocationURI.documentation: A data type for The URI at which this package is available for download. Private (i.e., not publicly reachable) URIs are acceptable as values of this property. The values http://spdx.org/rdf/terms#none and http://spdx.org/rdf/terms#noassertion may be used to specify that the package is not downloadable or that no attempt was made to determine its download location, respectively.

EndPointer.name: EndPointer
EndPointer.documentation: A data item for Pointer to the end point of the range.

ExampleText.name: ExampleText
ExampleText.documentation: A data type for Text for examples in describing an SPDX element.

ExternalDocumentID.name: ExternalDocumentID
ExternalDocumentID.documentation: A data type for externalDocumentId is a string containing letters, numbers, “.”, “-” or “+” which uniquely identifies an external document within this document.

ExternalReferenceSiteURI.name: ExternalReferenceSiteURI
ExternalReferenceSiteURI.documentation: A data type for Website for the maintainers of the external reference site

ExtractedText.name: ExtractedText
ExtractedText.documentation: A data type for Verbatim license or licensing notice text that was discovered.

FileContributorText.name: FileContributorText
FileContributorText.documentation: A data type for This field provides a place for the SPDX file creator to record file contributors. Contributors could include names of copyright holders and/or authors who may not be copyright holders yet contributed to the file content.

FileName.name: FileName
FileName.documentation: A data type for The name of the file relative to the root of the package.

FileTypeCode.name: FileTypeCode
FileTypeCode.documentation: A data item for FileType properties

FilesAnalyzedIndicator.name: FilesAnalyzedIndicator
FilesAnalyzedIndicator.documentation: A data type for Indicates whether the file content of this package has been available for or subjected to analysis when creating the SPDX document. If “false” indicates packages that represent metadata or URI references to a project, product, artifact, distribution or a component. If set to “false”, the package must not contain any files.

HasExtractedLicensingInfo.name: HasExtractedLicensingInfo
HasExtractedLicensingInfo.documentation: A data item for Indicates that a particular ExtractedLicensingInfo was defined in the subject SpdxDocument.

HasFile.name: HasFile
HasFile.documentation: A data item for Indicates that a particular file belongs to a package.

IsDeprecatedLicenseID.name: IsDeprecatedLicenseID
IsDeprecatedLicenseID.documentation: A data item that indicates if the license id is Deprecated.

IsFsfLibreIndicator.name: IsFsfLibreIndicator
IsFsfLibreIndicator.documentation: A data item to indicate if the license is FSF Libre.

IsOsiApprovedIndicator.name: IsOsiApprovedIndicator
IsOsiApprovedIndicator.documentation: A data type for Indicates if the OSI has approved the license.

LicenseCommentsText.name: LicenseCommentsText
LicenseCommentsText.documentation: A data type for he licenseComments property allows the preparer of the SPDX document to describe why the licensing in spdx:licenseConcluded was chosen.

LicenseConcludedCode.name: LicenseConcludedCode
LicenseConcludedCode.documentation: A data item for LicenseConcluded properties

LicenseDeclared.name: LicenseDeclared
LicenseDeclared.documentation: A data item for The licensing that the creators of the software in the package, or the packager, have declared. Declarations by the original software creator should be preferred, if they exist.

LicenseDeclaredCode.name: LicenseDeclaredCode
LicenseDeclaredCode.documentation: A data item for LicenseDeclared properties

LicenseExceptionID.name: LicenseExceptionID
LicenseExceptionID.documentation: A data type for short form license exception identifier in Appendix I.2 of the SPDX specification.

LicenseExceptionText.name: LicenseExceptionText
LicenseExceptionText.documentation: A data type for Full text of the license exception.

LicenseID.name: LicenseID
LicenseID.documentation: A data type for A human readable short form license identifier for a license. The license ID is iether on the standard license oist or the form "LicenseRef-"[idString] where [idString] is a unique string containing letters, numbers, ".", "-" or "+".

LicenseInfoFromFiles.name: LicenseInfoFromFiles
LicenseInfoFromFiles.documentation: A data item for The licensing information that was discovered directly within the package. There will be an instance of this property for each distinct value of alllicenseInfoInFile properties of all files contained in the package.

LicenseInfoFromFilesCode.name: LicenseInfoFromFilesCode
LicenseInfoFromFilesCode.documentation: A data item for LicenseInfoFromFiles properties

LicenseListVersionText.name: LicenseListVersionText
LicenseListVersionText.documentation: A data type for An optional field for creators of the SPDX file to provide the version of the SPDX License List used when the SPDX file was created.

LicenseText.name: LicenseText
LicenseText.documentation: A data type for Full text of the license.

LineNumberNumeric.name: LineNumberNumeric
LineNumberNumeric.documentation: A data type for Line number within the reference starting at one.

LocatorFormatText.name: LocatorFormatText
LocatorFormatText.documentation: A data type for Regular expression for the format of the external repository identifier

Member.name: Member
Member.documentation: A data item for A license, or other licensing information, that is a member of the subject license set.

Name.name: Name
Name.documentation: A data type for The full human readable name of the item. This should include version information when applicable.

NoticeText.name: NoticeText
NoticeText.documentation: A data type for This field provides a place for the SPDX file creator to record potential legal notices found in the file. This may or may not include copyright statements.

OffsetNumeric.name: OffsetNumeric
OffsetNumeric.documentation: A data type for Offset from the start of the reference.

OriginatorText.name: OriginatorText
OriginatorText.documentation: A data type for The name and, optionally, contact information of the person or organization that originally created the package. Values of this property must conform to the agent and tool syntax.

PackageFileName.name: PackageFileName
PackageFileName.documentation: A data type for The base name of the package file name. For example, zlib-1.2.5.tar.gz.

PackageName.name: PackageName
PackageName.documentation: A data type for Identify the full name of the package as given by Package Originator.

PackageVerificationCodeValue.name: PackageVerificationCodeValue
PackageVerificationCodeValue.documentation: A data type for The actual package verification code as a hex encoded value.

Range.name: Range
Range.documentation: A data item for This field defines the byte range in the original host file (in X.2) that the snippet information applies to

Reference.name: Reference
Reference.documentation: A data item for Scope within which a single pointer operates.

ReferenceCategoryCode.name: ReferenceCategoryCode
ReferenceCategoryCode.documentation: A data item for ReferenceCategory properties

ReferenceLocatorText.name: ReferenceLocatorText
ReferenceLocatorText.documentation: A data type for The unique string with no spaces necessary to access the package-specific information, metadata, or content within the target location. The format of the locator is subject to constraints defined by the <type>.

RelatedSpdxElement.name: RelatedSpdxElement
RelatedSpdxElement.documentation: A data item for A related SpdxElement.

RelationshipTypeCode.name: RelationshipTypeCode
RelationshipTypeCode.documentation: A data item for RelationshipType properties

SeeAlsoURI.name: SeeAlsoURI
SeeAlsoURI.documentation: A data type for rdfs:seeAlso is an instance of rdf:Property that is used to indicate a resource that might provide additional information about the subject resource.

SnippetFromFile.name: SnippetFromFile
SnippetFromFile.documentation: A data item for File containing the SPDX element (e.g. the file contaning a snippet).

SnippetName.name: SnippetName
SnippetName.documentation: A data item to name a specific snippet in a human convenient manner

SourceInfoText.name: SourceInfoText
SourceInfoText.documentation: A data type for Allows the producer(s) of the SPDX document to describe how the package was acquired and/or changed from the original source.

SpecVersionText.name: SpecVersionText
SpecVersionText.documentation: A data type for Identifies the version of this specification that was used to produce this SPDX document. The value for this version of the spec is SPDX-1.2. The values SPDX-1.0 and SPDX-1.1 may also be supported by SPDX tools for backwards compatibility purposes.

StandardLicenseHeader.name: StandardLicenseHeader
StandardLicenseHeader.documentation: A data type for License author's preferred text to indicated that a file is covered by the license.

StandardLicenseHeaderText.name: StandardLicenseHeaderText
StandardLicenseHeaderText.documentation: A data type for License author's preferred text to indicated that a file is covered by the license.

StandardLicenseTemplate.name: StandardLicenseTemplate
StandardLicenseTemplate.documentation:
A data type for License template which describes sections of the license which can be varied. See License Template section of the specification for format
 information.

StandardLicenseTemplateText.name: StandardLicenseTemplateText
StandardLicenseTemplateText.documentation: A data type for License template which describes sections of the license which can be varied. See License Template section of the specification for format information.

StartPointer.name: StartPointer
StartPointer.documentation: A data item for Pointer to the start point of the range in a compound pointer.

SummaryText.name: SummaryText
SummaryText.documentation: A data type for Provides a short description of the package.

SupplierText.name: SupplierText
SupplierText.documentation: A data type for The name and, optionally, contact information of the person or organization who was the immediate supplier of this package to the recipient. The supplier may be different than originator when the software has been repackaged. Values of this property must conform to the agent and tool syntax.

VerificationCodeExcludedFileText.name: VerificationCodeExcludedFileText
VerificationCodeExcludedFileText.documentation: A data type for A file that was excluded when calculating the package verification code. This is usually a file containing SPDX data regarding the package. If a package contains more than one SPDX file all SPDX files must be excluded from the package verification code. If this is not done it would be impossible to correctly calculate the verification codes in both files.

VersionInfoText.name: VersionInfoText
VersionInfoText.documentation: A data type for Provides an indication of the version of the package that is described by this SpdxDocument.
